scripts.myNotesBddTestLocal: npm config set acceptance-tests:file Protractor/mynotes.protractor.conf.local.js --prefix ./acceptance-tests && npm test --prefix ./acceptance-tests
scripts.myNotesBddTestDev: npm config set acceptance-tests:file Protractor/mynotes.protractor.conf.dev.js --prefix ./acceptance-tests && npm test --prefix ./acceptance-tests
